TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchema extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchema extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject

summary.span: 按照万维网联合会 (W3C) XML 架构第 1 部分：“结构”和 XML 架构第 2 部分：“数据类型”内容指定的 XML 架构内存中表示形式。

span.span: An in-memory representation of an XML Schema, as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Schema Part 1: Structures and XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes].

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 这样做会破坏代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构 (包括内联架构) 在本质上容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不要在不受信任的情况下接受它们。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 由于使用类（如类）而引发的异常 可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 例如，的 属性将 返回引发异常的架构文件的 URI 路径。For example, the property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 不应在不受信任的方案中公开属性。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 异常应得到正确处理，因此不受信任的情况下不会公开此敏感信息。Exceptions should be properly handled so this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个架构定义。The following example creates a schema definition. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的 XML 文件是针对前面的代码示例生成的。The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在架构的目标命名空间中声明的属性的窗体。

span.span: Gets or sets the form for attributes declared in the target namespace of the schema.

value.span: 值，它表明来自目标命名空间的特性是否需要用命名空间前缀限定。

span.span: The value that indicates if attributes from the target namespace are required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值必须是 下表中显示的值之一。The value must be one of the values shown in the following table. | 值 Value|说明Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||架构中未指定属性形式。The attribute form is not specified in schema.| ||目标命名空间中的特性必须用命名空间前缀限定。Attributes from the target namespace must be qualified with the namespace prefix.| ||目标命名空间中的特性不需要用命名空间前缀限定。Attributes from the target namespace are not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.| 对于在目标命名空间中声明的所有属性，该值是全局默认值。This value is the global default for all attributes declared in the target namespace. 单个属性可以使用属性重写本地范围的此设置 `form` 。Individual attributes can override this setting for the local scope using the `form` attribute.

summary.span: 获取或设置 特性，该特性设置 架构中的元素和复杂类型的 特性的默认值。

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute which sets the default value of the attribute on element and complex types in the of the schema.

value.span: 值，它表示阻止派生的不同方法。

span.span: An value representing the different methods for preventing derivation.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `block`特性禁止 `complexType` 使用具有指定派生类型的或元素替代继承的 `complexType` 或元素。The `block` attribute prevents a `complexType` or element that has the specified type of derivation from being used in place of the inherited `complexType` or element. 此属性的值可以是以空格分隔的限制、扩展和替换的列表，也可以包含或包含 `#all` 扩展、限制或替换子集的列表。This attribute's value can either be a white space separated list of restriction, extension and substitution or the value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension, restriction, or substitution. 下表列出了的可能值 。The following table lists the possible values of . |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|默认情况下，架构中的类型派生没有限制。By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.| |`Empty`|重写默认派生方法，并允许在架构中进行任何类型派生。Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.| |`Extension`|默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过扩展派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension. 仅适用于元素和复杂类型元素。Applies only to element and complex type elements.| |`Restriction`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过限制派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`Union`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过 Union 派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`List`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能由列表派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过任何方法派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 SOM 通过或元素引用其他命名 `import` 空间 `include` ，则 `XmlResolver` 使用来解析这些引用。If the SOM references other namespaces through the `import` or `include` elements, the `XmlResolver` is used to resolve these references. 如果解析程序设置为 `null` ，则表示用户不关心解析 `import` 或 `include` 元素。If the resolver is set to `null`, this indicates that the user does not care about resolving `import` or `include` elements. 在这种情况下，不会解析引用。In this case, the references are not resolved. 方法完成后，解析程序不会缓存 `Compile` 。The resolver is not cached after the `Compile` method completes. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此 方法在 Microsoft .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时，已被 方法替换。The method is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 默认情况下，该方法使用 类解析包含、导入或重新定义元素中引用的外部架构。The method uses the class to resolve external schemas referenced in include, import, or redefine elements by default. 可以通过将 null 作为参数传递来禁用外部架构的解析 。You can disable resolution of external schemas by passing null as the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `final`特性可防止指定类型的元素或复杂类型的派生。The `final` attribute prevents the specified type of derivation of an element or complex type. 此值可以包含 `#all` 或包含扩展或限制子集的列表。This value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension or restriction. 下表列出了的可能值 。The following table lists the possible values of . |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|默认情况下，架构中的类型派生没有限制。By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.| |`Empty`|重写默认派生方法，并允许在架构中进行任何类型派生。Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.| |`Extension`|默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过扩展派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension. 仅适用于元素和复杂类型元素。Applies only to element and complex type elements.| |`Restriction`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过限制派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`Union`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过 Union 派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`List`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能由列表派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过任何方法派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.|

summary.span: 获取或设置架构目标命名空间的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the schema target namespace.

value.span: 架构目标命名空间。

span.span: The schema target namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是此架构中所有架构组件的命名空间，以及使用元素包括的任何架构 `include` 。The is the namespace of all schema components in this schema as well as any schema included using the `include` element. 包含的架构必须具有与包含架构相同的目标命名空间，或没有指定的目标命名空间。Included schemas must either have the same target namespace as the containing schema or have no target namespace specified.
